subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The German-American pipeline was put in place before Jurgen Klinsmann, a German soccer legend, took over as coach, and the benefits are purely coincidental.
